attributes.action: Cap the rate landlords can charge for rent
attributes.additional_details: Discourage landlords from owning multiple properties. Tenant will pay a fair rent amount and not be exploited. Property valued yearly to keep up with market changes.
attributes.background:
Cap the rate at 5% the property value per year plus valuation fee over 12 months if mortgage is paid.

Cap the rate at monthly mortgage rate plus 5% if mortgage is not paid.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Put a cap on profits made by private landlords: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648065
